kickstart.post:
mkdir -p /etc/security/ca mkdir -p /etc/security/ca/new-certs
[ req ] default_bits = 1024 default_md = md5 string_mask = nombstr # permitted characters distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
[ v3_ca ] basicConstraints = CA:TRUE subjectKeyIdentifier = hash authorityKeyIdentifier = keyid:always,issuer:always
[ req_distinguished_name ] 0.organizationName = Organization Name (company) organizationalUnitName = Organizational Unit Name (department, division) emailAddress = Email Address emailAddress_max = 64 localityName = Locality Name (city, district) stateOrProvinceName = State or Province Name (full name) countryName = Country Name (2 letter code) countryName_min = 2 countryName_max = 2 commonName = Common Name (hostname, IP, or your name)
commonName_default = &Kickstart_PublicHostname; organizationalUnitName_default = &Info_ClusterName;-CA emailAddress_default = &Info_ClusterContact; 0.organizationName_default = &Info_CertificateOrganization; localityName_default = &Info_CertificateLocality; stateOrProvinceName_default = &Info_CertificateState; countryName_default = &Info_CertificateCountry;

if [ -f /tmp/security/ca.key ] then mv /tmp/security/ca.key /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/ca/ mv /tmp/security/ca.crt /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/ca/ mv /tmp/security/ca.serial /mnt/sysimage/etc/security/ca/ fi

if [ ! -f /etc/security/ca/ca.key ] then ( cd /etc/security/ca; \ /usr/bin/openssl req -new -x509 -extensions v3_ca -nodes \ -keyout ca.key -days 5000 -batch -config ca.cfg > ca.crt; \ chmod 0400 ca.key; \ chmod 0444 ca.crt; \ echo "01" > ca.serial ) fi
chmod 0750 /etc/security/ca chmod 0770 /etc/security/ca/new-certs chmod 0664 /etc/security/ca/ca.serial chmod 0440 /etc/security/ca/ca.key chmod 0640 /etc/security/ca/ca.cfg
chgrp -R apache /etc/security/ca
